---
id: insert
title: "Insert"
description: "Inserts an array of docs into the embeddings database."
api: 
info_path: docs/answers/answers
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Insert</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/answers/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Inserts an array of docs into the embeddings database.
## Request
<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"docs"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"Students must wear a tie in term 2 and term 3."},"description":"An array of strings that contain the content for each doc to be inserted.","example":["Students must wear a tie in term 2 and term 3."]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"access"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"students"},"description":"An array of strings that denote the groups that have access to these docs. Defaults to 'public'."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"School Policies"},"description":"An array of strings representing tags for the docs being inserted. Defaults to an empty array.","example":["School Policies","Technology","IT"]}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
